name: Music_4635.wav
keywords: ['male voice', 'backing vocals', 'drums', 'bass guitar', 'acoustic guitar', 'uplifting atmosphere', 'bird chirping', 'children having fun']
caption: The music features a male voice singing and being accompanied by backing vocals. The drums play a laid-back rhythm and together with the bass guitar drive the pulse of the music. An acoustic guitar is accompanying the singer lightly. In the background one can hear birds chirping and children having fun. The overall atmosphere is uplifting.
